post.body: I don't eat pig! Why would I waste my time with an unclean piece of fat when there are so many juicy, tasty cows?
I'd never debate @VoltjanStevens! I would totally win and then he wouldn't be my friend anymore. It's a liberal media thing.
Sure I'll vote for you! Yeah, no. Turns out I'm too apathetic to do that too.
was nominated for an award! He hinted he wanted to be nominated the other day, but I was too apathetic to do it.
YES!!! Do you follow @bobbyllew? He's revising his role as Kryten. He has a lot of interesting things to say.
So what's the going price for eyebrows? Do they make a good investment?
I'm good like that. You know the Where's Waldo books? I can always spot the syphilitic, evil clown! It's all about focus.
You're not tired because it's only ... OMG! It's late! You probably should be tired!
For the record, I've never tasted zombies. Er...you didn't save any by chance, did you?
I also might have missed the point there.
I think it's about time people stop having birthday parties for toddlers!
I'm getting impatient...ENTERTAIN ME!!!!
I'll be more into it once I put up the Xmas Driftwood. Try making a festive, jolly avatar. That might help! (Probably won't)
Shop safe! Take your pepper spray! Keep an eye out for stray, rabid shoppers!
lol another great review! Knowing I want the issues of Ambush Bug I've missed, my brother will get me All Star Batman.
yeah yeah yeah! That's the one! Thanks!
You have the motivation to look at a clock? Somehow my inactivity seems even more sloth-like now!
That's why I prefer self created families to biological/forced ones.
Welcome to Bacon - tonight on Point/CounterPoint.
RT @VoltjanStevens: Hooray! My public defeat is a private victory! lol! Can I get that on a bumper sticker?
hahah - not 80's It says 2001. Ee gad.
Example of why I don't channel surf - I'm not watching some 80's TV show to find out why Jack Palance has no arms.
I collect Sheckley's German novels b/c the covers are bizarrely wonderful - like this @warrenellis German ed.! http://tinyurl.com/6e5uox
Has anybody seen Slumdog Millionaire? Might do a double feature tomorrow.
They poisoned the quadrotriticale!
I swear my brother only comes up to visit to watch football on my TV. So annoying!
I read a hilarious review of Frank Miller's Batman & Robin (Boy Wonder). Where was it?? Did I get the link from @VoltjanStevens? IDK
me: Did you doubt me? @brandice: Yes! Of course I did! me: :~(
Odin clearly doesn't want us to finish the New Year's Eve episode.
Xmas episode done. Tea made me sick. Bad choice. Going to play through the pain and film New Year's not-so-rocking Eve ep.
http://twitpic.com/ur75 - This is me in my waiting for Santa pajamas & pig tails between STeaP segments.
http://twitpic.com/uqto - Tech delay filming STeaP but @brandice stays in good spirits!
My brother says he was going for a swarthy Mediteranean look. hahaha epic fail or too close to be funny?
And I'm off for much filming and merry making.
I have given myself a ridiculous hairdo for filming the Xmas episode of STeaP today. You won't want to miss this one!
Here the "greaseball" is! http://tinyurl.com/7vezxq He's actually Scotch/Irish/Cherokee. BTW he did not win the Emmy.
"Who's that greaseball Italian?" That would be my brother. "But you aren't Italian." No, he's just going for a look. Hilarious!
Things found while looking for Santa hat: Dick Tracy yo-yo, Times Two single "Cecilia", leopard print Xmas stocking...not hat so far.
I'm going to say right now that if Hugh Laurie isn't Higgins I won't go see it. http://tinyurl.com/69j26l
"Which door is England?" haha Yeah, it's not the greatest movie ever made, but it does have some funny lines.
